content:
# elizaos/eliza Daily Update (Jan 22, 2026)
## OVERVIEW 
The day's development focused on critical bug fixes, primarily addressing Python example testing and documentation, alongside resolving API endpoint issues for index, contributor profiles, and overall summaries.

## KEY TECHNICAL DEVELOPMENTS

### Python Example and Plugin Enhancements
Significant work was done to improve the Python examples and plugins. This included adding quickstart documentation, fixing the chat example to properly use the inmemorydb plugin, and enabling `.env` file support via dotenv loading. The inmemorydb plugin was also updated to use the correct `Plugin` interface. ([#6358](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/pull/6358))

## NEWLY OPENED PULL REQUESTS
No new pull requests were opened today.

## CLOSED ISSUES

### API Endpoint Availability Fixes
Two critical issues related to API endpoint availability were resolved. The first addressed 404 errors for the `/api/index.json` and `/api/contributors/{username}/profile.json` endpoints by dynamically detecting the `SITE_URL` in the `run-pipelines.yml` workflow. ([#225](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/225)) The second fix ensured that overall summary API endpoints no longer return 404 for days with no repository activity, instead providing a "No activity recorded" message. ([#226](https://github.com/elizaos/eliza/issues/226))

## NEW ISSUES
No new issues were reported today.

## ACTIVE ISSUES
No active issues with more than 3 comments.
